attributes.review: I would like to formally state this is the worst man alive, and there’re some pretty bad men out there!! If you care about human rights and JUSTICE you will not get this app. Thank you for your time💫🧚🏼‍♂️💕✨

attributes.review: This app was just so bad I honestly have no words for it I recommend not to download it 😑🥱

attributes.review: I opened the app and saw a small little blob of orange and then saw a wig and wanted to yank it off. Then when I opened it I saw a disgusting naked man on the app and it was terrorizing I am traumatized and needed therapy

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. Once I opened it, I heard the screams of terror. Getting this app is like opening Pandora’s box. Don’t do it!
attributes.title: Just No

attributes.review: This app is horrible and made my phone glitch for 4 hours. And should a dancing pickle on my screen.

attributes.review: When I slipped in the shower this morning I accidentally downloaded this horrendous app. The way this Cheeto pig stared straight into my soul made me upchuck. Horrible horrible horrible.

attributes.review: I hated it. It lagged and closed out so much it was barely usable. would not recommend no matter how mentally unstable you are. -4/10
